english: I'm going.

text: İkisini de bırakın ya da hepinizi öldürün. Sen bizi aptal mı zannettin?
english: Leave them alone or I will kill you all. Did you think we were fools?
I could not explain.

text: Ya ikisini de bırakırsınız ya da hepinizi öldürün. Son kez söylüyorum bırak!
english: Either you leave them both or you all die. I am saying it for the last time! Let them go!
We need to stop it quickly.

text: ...bukun bir kısmı içeride kaldı. İlk önce onu çıkarmamız lazım. Hallederiz. Evelallah.
english: A part of the body is still inside. We must get rid of it first. We will, thank God.
You know how much I trust Canan.

text: Onun için sana en zor görevi verdim.
english: That is why I gave you the hardest task.

text: Senin görev yerin Kayıların obası olacak. Yolunuz açık olsun.
english: Your place of duty will be the Kayi tribe. May God speed you.
We didn't understand what you were trying to do sir.
And me, my dear knight.

text: Bu küçük kudretli ordun tüm İslam dünyasına...
english: I will send this small powerful army to the whole Islamic world.
I will spread the curse of the devil. No hurry from tomorrow.

text: Kervan için obanın satılacak malzemelerini toplayacaksın.
english: You will collect the materials for the caravan.

text: Üç gün içinde de kervanı yola çıkaracaksın.
english: You will set off the caravan in three days.
Why do you take your goods to the market?

text: Kara Toygar'ın niyeti kötü. Kervanı basabilir. İşte bu yüzden malları tacirin eline veremeyiz.
english: Farah Toygar is not in the best of intentions. She could kill the caravan. That is why we cannot give the goods to the trader.
Gundogdu will do this with his Alps.

text: Emrin olur baba. Ne istersin Beyoğlu?
english: As you command, father. What do you want, son?

text: Sizden yurt almaya geldim. Peki karşılığında ne vereceksin?
english: I came to get some land from you. What will you give in return?
If you give us a place to live...

text: Karşılığında iki bin tane alp başın her dara düştüğünde yanında olacak.
english: In return, 2,000 Alps will be with you when you are in trouble.

text: Benim sarayımın muhafızlarının sayısı bile bundan fazla.
english: My palace has more guards than this.
Godspeed, son.
Next.
Next.
Stop!
Yes.
Yes, sir.
How will we talk, Turkmen?

text: Obamız için bereketli bir kışlak isteriz.
english: We want a prosperous winter for our tribe.
It's like

text: Önce kışlak istersiniz. Sonra olur o yaylak.
english: First you want a necklace, then that necklace.

text: Sonra bir de yurt istersiniz siz.
english: Then you want a home.
We want.

text: ...dışarıya mı icayet yüklemezsin? Bütün obanın yükünü omzuma koydun. Bana bu yükün altında kalkmayı nasip et ya Rabbim.
english: You are the only one who can live. You put the burden of the whole tribe on my shoulders. May God not let me be under this burden.
Thank God.
What did you talk about at dinner?

text: Ne istiyormuş El Aziz'den? Kayılar, kışlamak için yer istediler emirden.
english: What does El Aziz want? Kayis. They asked for a place to stay for the winter.
You must get what the Kayis want.
How? I don't understand.
They will be killed.

text: Haçlı Komutluğun sınırlarında olsun. Sadece Ertuğrul değil, soyunu da kurutmak için bundan daha iyi bir fırsat olamaz.
english: ...in the limits of the Crusaders. Not only Ertugrul. There can't be a better chance to establish his lineage.
You...

text: İstediğiniz yurdu vermeye karar verdik Beyoğlu.
english: We decided to give you the homeland you wanted, son of a Bey.

text: Doğrusu bizi buna Nasır ikna etti.
english: Nasir convinced us to do so.
Do you know the number?
West of the Asi River.

text: Topraklarının bereketli olduğunu duydum. Düşmanları da bereketlidir.
english: I heard that their lands are blessed. Their enemies are blessed too.
We will set the sun, the flag, the sky and the tent on fire.
We will send our men to the unarmed tribes.

text: Pusatlarımızı yar eyleyip ordularımızı gür kılacağız.
english: We will make our armies strong by making our weapons strong.

text: Tamgamız yedi iklimde adaletin sancağı diye dalgalanacak.
english: Our flag will be waved as the flag of justice in seven seasons.

text: İlahi Muştumuzu dağların denizlerin ötesine taşıyacağız.
english: ...we will carry our divine idol beyond the mountains and seas.
My Sultan!
Take care of the treasures.
I swear.
Too bad.
You did not deserve any of this, Gundogdu.
I told your father.

text: Esirleri vermezsen gök kubbeyi başına yıkarım.
english: If you do not give the prisoners, I will destroy the sky.
Now, let him think.
Your cousins?
Or will he choose your son?
The tribe is suffering from hunger. There is famine everywhere.
We could not even get to one of them. Why?

text: Çünkü beyimizin çıbanlı başı dertte. Bütün oba halkı senin yaşlılığından şikayetçi.
english: Because our Bey's head is in trouble. The whole tribe complains about your old age.
I said I would beat him up.
Thank God, he accepted.
We have a throne now.

text: Lakin işimiz hiç kolay değil. Kayı kolay olana talip olmaz evlat. Evelallah.
english: But our job is not easy. A Kayi does not ask for easy things, son.
We will overcome all difficulties.
May God be with you.
You came with good news.
I swear to God.
...in the name of God.
The heir of the nobility.
Now, go to bed.
You will join the council.
...and told all the Kayi Beys...
You will give the muslim from Aleppo.

text: Meseleyi eline boyuna konuşuruz hep beraber.
english: We will talk about it together.

text: Müsaade varsa istirahate çekilmeden önce bir işim var.
english: If you allow me, I have something to do before I go to bed.
I want to take care of him.
Thank God.

text: Umudumuzun bittiği anda Ertuğrul'u çıkardın karşımıza.
english: You brought Ertugrul right when we were out of hope.
...and made him powerful against the oppressors.

text: Şimdi de iyi haberlerle sağ salim dönmeyi nasip et.
english: Now, please return safely with good news.
I learned it from Aykiz.
Did you see?
I didn't look.
I'm surprised you're here so soon.

text: Sana söylemedim mi? Atımı hiç durmadan süreceğim. Tez gelip tez geleceğim demedim mi?
english: Didn't I tell you? I will drive my horse constantly. Didn't I tell you that I will come back soon?
I kept my word.
Did you bring good news?

text: Yeni bir yurt var mı gidecek?
english: Will he go to a new home?
Thank you.

text: O bu halkı sonunda rahat bir nefes alacak.
english: He will breathe a good life in the end.
Everyone was watching Yunus.
Aykiz.
Is Aykiz the worst?
I mean...
My parents.
The babies that sleep in the cold of the spring.
Everyone.
all of us

text: Kıslaştığım her zorlukta bana güç verdi.
english: You gave me strength in every difficulty I faced.

text: Ne zaman dara düşsem, senin de benim yanımda olduğunu hatırlattı bana.
english: Whenever I was in trouble, she reminded me that you were with me.
I bought them for you.
Yes.
I wanted to see you too.
Like a dream.

text: Her rüya gibi bunun da bir sonu var.
english: Every dream has an end.
What happened Halime?
Don't worry.
Ferhat Uygar.
He tried to kidnap us.

text: O bizim peşimizi asla bırakmayacak Ertugrul.
english: He will never leave us, Ertugrul.
Rest in peace.
I hope so.
I will never leave you.
My father's death anniversary today.
It's been 8 years.
I wish I could cry.
...in the world.
Not for your father's death.
You should pray for him to live.
No one has seen his corpse until today.

text: Kim bilir belki de hayattadır. Sevgili kızıyla bir gün karşılaşacağı hayali onu hayatta tutuyordur.
english: Who knows, maybe she's alive. Maybe she's living the dream of meeting her daughter one day.

text: Ne vakit geldi de bu uğursuzla buluştu?
english: It is time for me to meet this bastard.
Good luck, aunt.

text: Ertuğrul Bey'imiz gelir gelmez bu kızın yanında almış Sulu Ana.
english: Ertugrul Bey came and went and took the bride to this girl, mother.

text: Öyle nereden gelirler? Yan yana nasıl yürürler?
english: Where do they come from? How do they walk side by side?

text: Bir işin aslını bilip bilmeden içine fesatlık sokma Selcan.
english: Don't get into trouble without knowing the truth, Selcan.
Nobody benefits from this.

text: Ertuğrul geldiğinde ilk önce bizim elimizi öptü.
english: Ertugrul first killed us when he came.

text: Vallahi bu misafirlik konusunu bir an önce halletmemiz lazım ana.
english: We need to take care of this guesthouse as soon as possible, mother.

text: Bey babam bu olanları bilmiyor, görmüyor. Bu kızın ocağımıza kastı var.
english: My father and father don't know about this. This girl is here for us.

text: ...giriniz işleyeceğine eliniz işlesin. Dünya kadar iş var.
english: ...and do what you are supposed to do. There is so much work to do.
Eyman Shah
I'm not.
Ertugrul is back from Aleppo.
He took the land from El Aziz.
Ertugrul is out of our hands.

text: Sen Kurdoğlu Bey'inde oyun tükenir mi sanırsın?
english: Do you think Kurdoglu Bey is out of his mind?

text: Elbet bizim de bir hesabımız var.
english: We have our own plans.
50 TL.

text: Keferenin kılıcı seninkinden hallice. Dikkat oğlum. Nereden buldun bu eşek sopasını? Geberttiğimiz açlılardan. Gavur pusu altından ne anlar bak.
english: Kefere's sword is better than yours. Son, where did you find this donkey's stick? From the hungry people we killed. Look at the poor people's weapons.
That's what you call a man who sells.

text: Elif gibi eğri olacak. Yiğidin bileğine oturacak. Keliğe baş olacak.
english: He will be as agile as Elif. He will sit on the arm of a brave man. He will be the head of a camel.

text: Kara Toygar'ın adamları Halime'nin çadırı basmış Deli Demir.
english: Kara Toygar's men raided Halime's tent, Deli Demir.
Is that right?

text: Çadırı namus bilesin diye emanet ettim.
english: I entrusted the tent to him so that he would appreciate it.

text: Nasıl olur da burnumuzun dibine kadar gelip çadır basarlar?
english: How could they come to our den and set up a tent?
You're right Ertugrul.
Thank you, Master Demir.

text: Senin sayende hayatı kurtulmuş bir işaret. Yok.
english: It's a solution that saved your life.
Not just me.
It's a good thing.
He was the man who came to the tribe.

text: Ama biliyor musun Ertuğrul her şeyde bir hayır var.
english: But you know Ertugrul, everything has a good side.

text: Eğer o itler iyice kudurup obaya gelip...
english: If those dogs come to the tribe and...
If they hadn't attacked the Alimelis...
That night, Halime...
They will escape.
What about outside the tribe?

text: Başka bir yerde iyice çoğalansalardı, hiçbirimizin haberi olmazdı.
english: If they were in another place, we wouldn't know anything..
Ali Melas.
They will.
Thank you.
Is Afsin in Tepe?
Look at the animal's footman Ali.

text: Durun beyim gelir gelmez seni sordu. Öyle bir gidişi vardı ki arkandan görecektin. Biz de birazdan buluşacağız Turgut'umla.
english: My son-in-law asked you about you. He had such a plan that you were going to see it. We will meet soon, Turgut.
My heart is beating fast when I'm away.

text: Çok şükür döndüler ya sağ salim. Hem de güzel haberlerle.
english: Thank God, they are back safely and with good news.

text: Sabrın sonu selamettir ay kız. Düğünümüz yakındır artık. Ay heyecandan elime yan buz kesti baksana.
english: Patience is the best thing, Aykiz. Our wedding is near. I am so excited that my hands are freezing.
Did Ertugrul Bey buy this?
It is very nice.

text: Demek oralarda da seni düşünüp dururmuş Halime.
english: So Halime is thinking about you there.
Think about it, Aykiz.
Why do you say that, my beautiful Halime?
I'm going to eat.
You are not in the mood, Beylik.

text: Canını yakan bir şey mi var?
english: Is there something that hurts?
...so that you do not get burned.
I had to run away for the rest of my life.

text: İlk defa gitmek zorunda olduğum için canım acıyor.
english: I have to go for the first time, so I am in pain.
Whom did you run away from?
I do not know why you ran away.
Right.
I don't care.
But I know this, Halime.
You are not alone anymore.

text: Ertuğrul Bey'im ne gitme ne izin verir.
english: Ertugrul Bey won't let you go.
or anything bad happens to you.
It's not like...
You are a father.

text: Güvercin derbi bile huzur suz etti.
english: Even the pigeons are in peace.

text: Babamın öldüğü topraklardayım. Bir kez olsun onun mezarına dua etmek istiyorum.
english: I'm in the lands where my father died. I want to pray to God for his grave.
Now, we are going to the front.
The most famous one
He was the most brave knight.
Before the Turks killed my father...

text: Onu en son gören sendin Mário.
english: You were the last one to see him, Mario.
I was able to see
They ruined my life.

text: Tipsiz bir kuyu kadar kör olan gözlerimin gördüğü son şey baban oldu.
english: The last thing my eyes saw was you, father.
What if my father died?
While I was bleeding,
I dug it with my nails and buried it in the ground.
You're telling me that you buried him when your eyes were blind.

text: Ya gömgünü zannettiğin kişi? Baban bile bir başkasıysa. Senelerce hizmet ettiğim efendimi nasıl tanımam Eleonora?
english: Or the person you think is buried? If your father is someone else. How can I recognize my master whom I served for years, Eleonora?
I have to go.
Excuse me, dear.
Goodbye, Nora.
I'm going to a mission I can't complete without.
I wanted to say goodbye to you.
I will pray for you.

text: Bu mektubu kız kardeşim İzidora'ya göndermeni istiyorum.
english: I want you to send this letter to my sister Izadora.
...the death of his father.

text: kuşku dolu sorularıyla bir açığımı yakalamaya çalışıyor. Eleonora'nın attığı her adımdan haberim olmuş.
english: ...with his suspicious questions. I know everything Eleonora said.

text: Hayme Ana Ertuğrul'da gönlü var mı sor dedi.
english: Mother Hayme asked if Ertugrul had a heart.

text: Sen de akıllan artık. Böyle kıyılara köşelere gizlenip kendini yemekten vazgeç.
english: You should be wise. Stop hiding in the corners and eating your own food.
When I saw them together...

text: Demek gönlün var mı diye sordun.
english: So, you asked if I had a heart.
This is over.

text: Kaçmayacaksın. Her zaman olduğundan daha görünür olacaksın Ertuğrul'un gözüne.
english: You will not run away. You will look more beautiful than you always have been.
Sister.
Ertugrul's heart is with Halime.
You will see.
His mother asked me.
I know.
My son doesn't want me.
My beautiful sister, my pure sister.

text: Ertuğrul'a soran kim? Süleyman Şah seni Gökçe'yle evlendireceğim dedikten sonra......Ertuğrul itiraz edebilir mi sanıyorsun?
english: Who asked Ertugrul? After Suleyman Shah said he would marry you to Gokce......does Ertugrul think he can object?
He can't, right? Of course he can't.

text: Süleyman Şah'ın ağzından evlilik lafı bir kere çıktı mı......bu işi bitmiş bil.
english: Once Suleyman Shah says he wants to marry, it's over.

text: Hem sen Ertuğrul'un bugüne kadar baba sözünden çıktığını gördün mü hiç? Düğünün yakındır Gökçe kız. Böyle dertlenmeyi bırak. Gündoğdu Bey'imiz de dönsün eve. Ertuğrul'la sizi sözleriz.
english: Have you ever seen Ertugrul's promise to be a father? Your wedding is near, Gokce. Stop worrying. Let Gundogdu Bey come back and we will make a promise to you and Ertugrul.
Do you have permission, aunt?
Yes, sir.
subscribe
Welcome.
Thank you.

text: Bir halinizi hatırınızı sorayım dedim. İyisinizdir inşallah.
english: I wanted to ask you about your condition. I hope you are fine.

text: Seni gördük daha iyi olduk Ertuğrul Bey.
english: We're better now that we see you, Ertugrul Bey.
You took the homeland from Aleppo.
Thank God we did.

text: Ağabeyim dönsün kervanla, göç ederiz artık. Sağ salim dönsün de.
english: Let my brother return to the caravan, we can move out. I hope he comes back safely.
He will come back, inshallah.

text: Bütün oba yeni yurt ister. Karakış kapıda. Halep'e göçmeyelim de nereye göçelim?
english: The whole tribe wants a new homeland. At the Karakis Gate. Where else can they go if we don't migrate to Aleppo?

text: Var mı bildiğin çıkar bir yol?
english: Is there a way out?

text: Moğolların ordusu içinde kılıç çalan kaç Türkmen obası vardır bilir misin sen Alpargu?
english: Do you know how many Turkmen tribes have been......stealing swords from the Mongol army?
No, I don't know. I know.

text: Ertuğrul'un aklına uyup tıkılacağımız yılan deliği yerine......geriye dönüp Moğol kumandanlarıyla anlaşabiliriz. Tapınakçıların kılıçlarına canımızı siper edip......Halep'in bekçi itimi olsun Kayılar!
english: We can go back to the Mongol commanders instead of Ertugrul's......slavery that we will get into. We can spare our lives for the Templars' swords......and become the guard of Aleppo, Kayis!

text: Ya da onlarcasının yaptığı gibi koca Rum ülkesini baştan sona çapul niyetine heybemize mi dolduralım? Fakat beyim Moğollar defalarca girmediler mi kanımıza? Bu sefer farklı olacak işte!
english: Or should we fill our heads with the desire to be a shepherd......like the Greeks did? But my Bey, haven't the Mongols ever entered our camp? This time it will be different.
...and for the safety of this tribe.

text: Şeytanla bile iş tutmayı göze almalıyız.
english: We must keep in touch with the devil.
Don't forget.
Everything is for our tribe.
Now go

text: Şu Baybora denen ayran budalasıyla konuş.
english: Talk to that Ayran Budala called Baybora.

text: Dünkü bebenin aklını çelmesine de müsaade etme.
english: And don't let your baby to lose his mind.

text: Bugün ben susacağım, siz konuşacaksınız toyda!
english: I will keep quiet today and you will speak at the meeting.

text: Ertuğrul ballandıra ballandıra zaferini anlatırken......onu şöyle güzelce bir silkeleyin.
english: While Ertugrul is talking about his victory......try to erase it nicely.

text: Hem oba beylerinin de nabzını yoklamış oluruz. Bakalım sizinle birlikte kaç kişinin sesi yükselecek?
english: We have also checked the prayers of the tribe lords. Let's see how many people will raise their voices with you.
The rebels want it alive.

text: Daha da yük alacağız İlyas bakar.
english: We will be a big one, İlyas Bakır.

text: Beni obamıza göç edene kadar idare edeceksin artık. Amma uzattınız ha! Şunca bir kere kıvrılıp yatıveririz.
english: You'll be fine until you migrate to our tribe. You've got a long way to go. You'll just lie down here.
You have a place on my head, brothers.
What will he say to me?
I see you're all spread out.

text: Sakın ola İlyas Fakih'i bunaltmayın. Derli toplu olun biraz.
english: Don't let Ilyas Fakih down. Get some food, son.

text: Bilecekken obada olanları duymuşsundur. Eyvallah beyim. Turgut anlattı her şeyi.
english: You must have heard about the people in the tribe. Thank you, sir. Turgut told me everything.

text: Belli ki Kara Toygar'ın içeride bir adamı var. Biz yokken obayı basacak cesareti vermiş ona.
english: It is obvious that Kara Toygar has a man inside. He gave him the courage to take over the tribe when we were not there.
We need someone who will not draw attention.

text: Biz ne güne dururuz beyim? Sen şu cüsenle, cani suratınla mı yapacaksın bu işi?
english: How can we stop? Are you going to do this with that face?
Is there anyone suspicious?
Afsin.
The merchant's man?
He stayed in the tribe after saving Halime.
I want to know who he is.

text: Eyvallah beyim. Siz hiç merak buyurmayın. Nefesim ensesinde olacak.
english: Thank you, sir. Don't worry. He will be in his room.
I came here to ask for your permission sir.
It's time.
I'll finish the job I left tomorrow.
I will handle this job quietly.

text: İçinden nazlı bir bebek gibi büyüdün tıkamını.
english: You grew up like a baby with a baby inside.

text: Ama asla görevlerinin önüne geçmesine izin verme.
english: But never let him get ahead of his duties.
...to prevent the Turks from coming to our borders.
...filling...
...in the name of the Almighty God...
Bismillah.
You too, Ertugrul.

text: Yeni yurdumuz atalarımızın destanlarında anlattıkları efsanevi topraklara benziyor.
english: It resembles the legendary lands that our new homeland told in our ancestors' manuscripts.

text: Orası gibi korunaklı. Dört tarafı dağ ile çevrili. Çevre ahaliyi yelkesen diye isim dahi takmış mevkiye.
english: It is protected like a fortress. It is surrounded by mountains. The name of the place is also called the people of the surrounding area.
Then...

text: Taşı sıksan su akar. Öylesine bereketli ve mümbit bir yer.
english: Water flows if you plant a stone. It is a blessed and blessed place.

text: Kaylarımızın özgürce koşacağı, kışın ayazından kırılan hayvanlarımızın......semireceği bir dünya cenneti. Allah Allah. Sağ olasın. Sağ olasın.
english: A world paradise where our Kayas will run freely......and our animals will enjoy the winter sun. God bless you. Thank you.

text: Yurdu aldık diye her şey güllük gülistanlık değil elbet. Yeni menzilimiz toprağa bereketli......ama düşmanı da bir o kadar yaman bir yer.
english: We took the land, of course, it is not a happy place. Our new position is fertile but the enemy is also a very barren place.
There is a cross at the bottom of our nose.

text: Çocuklarımız ve sürülerimiz büyürken......etrafımızdaki fitne ateşi de büyüyecek.
english: While our children and our tribes grow, the fire of slander will grow around us.
If so...

text: Neden bize atadan dededen kalma masallar anlatıp......aklımızı bulandırırsın Ertuğrul Bey?
english: Why do you tell us stories from our ancestors and confuse us, Ertugrul Bey?
Yes, Alpargu is right. Yes, he is. He is right.
We want a home, not a grave.
...who made the land a home...
It is a grave, Baybora.
...in the name of God.
Our land is a curse.

text: Durduğumuzda vatan olur. Deli Demir doğru der. Evet doğru der.
english: If you stop, you will be a citizen. Deli Demir is right. Yes, he is right.
You are wrong, Mr. Pargu.
Do you think our ancestors' legends are fairy tales?

text: Onlar bebeği uyutmak için değil adamı uyandırmak içindir.
english: They are not for the baby, but to wake the man up.

text: Biz onlardan bereketli toprakları da öğrendik. Etrafını saran demir dağları eritmeyi de.
english: We learned about the fertile lands from them. And we also learned how to melt the iron mountains around them.
What do you think, Kurdoglu?
Ertugrul is right, my Bey.

text: Düşmanımızın varlığı bize gazi olmanın, şehit olmanın kapısını açar elhamdülillah.
english: The presence of our enemy opens the door to our martyrdom, praise be to God.
It will strengthen our tribe. We will collect treasure.
Is there anyone who opposes?
Thank you.
Since everyone agrees,
Then, let the preparation for migration begin.
Come here, Gundogdu.
I'm furious.
Me?
Or your mother?
Red cedar sherbet.
I don't love you, Karatoz.
Come on.

text: Aslında bu olanlara hiç gerek yok.
english: Actually, these things are not necessary.
God help us.

text: Yarın öbür gün ihtiyar babanın başına bir halt gelse.
english: If a horde of old men comes to your father the next day...
...to the ground.

text: Kayılar için daha hayırlı olmaz. Eğer ben bir gün bey olursam...
english: ...would not be better for the Kayis. If I become a Bey one day...
will be your death.
He will make his corpse to dogs.
Oh, man.
When I came to the tribe...
I thought Ertugrul was a hooligan.

text: Asıl cevval olan dişini göstermeyen öteki enikmiş.
english: The real one is the one who doesn't show his teeth, the other one is the female.
Bring him in.
Hamza?

text: Babana son bir fırsat vereceğim Gündoğdu.
english: I will give your father one last chance, Gundogdu.
Alp's Hamza.
I will send it to your father.
Tomorrow, they will be alone.
to bring him to me.
...if you do not accept my offer.

text: Önce seni sonra bütün kıyıları kılıçtan geçireceğim.
english: First, I will kill you and then I will kill all the Kylis.
Good luck.

text: Temiz kalpli bir komutanın yapabileceği ne varsa...
english: ...a clean hearted commander can do.
I will.
That's all I have.
Come on.
Do you understand me?
I'm sorry.
Aaaaah!
Take them to the cellar!
The arrow you said to run away from...
The eyelashes are like a arrow.

text: Öyle bir bakacaksın ki eline, kalbinden vuracaksın.
english: You will look at your husband and shoot him in the heart.
He will not see anyone but you.
Don't rub it too much.

text: Ben de yaralanmış gibi gözükmeyeyim. Merak etme.
english: I do not want to look like I am wounded. Do not worry.
You will be beautiful.
...like a Bey's wife.
With your curly hair...
with your apple cheeks.
You will be in pain all night.

text: Herkes sana bakacak. Ama en çok da Ertuğrul.
english: Everyone will look at you. But mostly Ertugrul.
Will he look at me Sahi?
You will see.
Bakmak Nesöz.
...will be shot from your heart and the seven worlds will hear it.
My sons.

text: ...evel zaman içinde. Yani......biz daha ata topraklarından buralara göçmeden...
english: It was a long time ago. I mean, we were not here from the lands of our ancestors...
...a long time ago...
...who killed our people...
...and the horses...

text: ...yılkı atlarını parçalayıp yiyen melul mu melul bir ejderha var.
english: There is a giant who eats the wings of a lion.
People are so scared.

text: ...durup yok mu bizi bu ejderhadan kurtaracak bir yiğit de?
english: Is there no brave man who can save us from this dragon?
He said go!

text: Abi o benim gibi değil. Taş.
english: I'll go and check.
...the broadcast...

text: okunu, kargısını, kılıcını aldığı gibi düşmüş yola.
english: ...he fell to the ground as if he had taken his sword and his sword.
Don't be a stranger.
Say hello to Ertugrul.

text: Beyim, Allah razı olsun senden. Sayende telef olmadık soğuklarda. Koç yiğitlerin hep böyle ardına düşe. Kızınla oba kurasın, oğlunla ordu olasın. Allah senden razı olsun. Başımızdan eksik ol. Amin.
english: My Bey, may God bless you. Thanks to you, we didn't get sick. May your soldiers always follow you. May you build a tribe with your daughter and have an army with your son. May God bless you. May we not suffer. Amen.

text: Baksana bizim hisli tekiye. Kilitlenip kaldı yine.
english: Look at our brave guard. He is locked up again.

text: Bu zatam dikilmiş ejderhanın karşısına bana bak demiş bana. Bu kılıçta sana öyle bir vururum ki.
english: My sword is right in front of the dragon. Look at me! I will hit you with this sword.
My biggest piece.
...in the name of God.
To the honor of our new homeland...
Let the Alps play sword and shield.
Let's make them pay for what they did.

text: Süleyman Şah töredir diye sahip çıktı size. Böyledir bizde.
english: Suleyman Shah is a thief, that's why he came to you. So am I.
What about you?

text: Misafir olunan yerde, beyoğluna göz kaş süzüp ayartmak mı vardır?
english: Do you have to look after your son instead of the guest?
What are you talking about?
I said I'd say it.
I understand.
You look like you're in shock.

text: Yoksa ün obadan kaçmaya mı niyetlisin?
english: Or are you going to run away from the tribe?
You must have heard about it.
We tried to escape.

text: Ama kaçamadık maalesef. Kimse gitmenizi istemiyor.
english: Unfortunately, we could not escape. No one wants you to go.
Our guest is holy.
That is our tradition.
Ertugrul Bey.
We carry the Black Clouds on us.

text: Gidelim ki obanın üstüne kara bulutlar dağılsın.
english: Let the dark clouds fall on the tribe.

text: Demek ben Halep'ten döndüğümde gitmiş olacaktınız öyle mi?
english: So you were going to leave when I returned from Aleppo, right?
You would have been in the lead.
My heart was going to burn.
My heart was going to be shattered.

text: Bunlar bizim peşimizi asla bırakmayacak Ertuğrul. Kim onlar Halime?
english: They will never leave us alone, Ertugrul. Who are they, Halime?

text: Ne istiyorlar sizden? Bizim kim olduğumuzu hiç bilmesen daha iyi Ertuğrul. Beyim, cüzdanlı birini yakaladık. Geliyor, geliyor.
english: What do they want from you? It would be better if you never knew who we are, Ertugrul. My Bey, we caught one of the traitors. We are coming.
Thank you.

text: Beyim yemek kazanlarına bir şey dökerken yakaladık bu kadını. Ecele mi susadın? Ne döktün kazanlara konuş.
english: Sir, we caught this woman while we were pouring something into the food pots. Are you deaf? Why did you pour it into the pots? Speak!
I brought greetings from the royal family, Ertugrul. My God!

text: Kazanlar ve bu kadını bir çukura koyun. Yakın!
english: Put the pot and this woman in a pit. Burn them!
What do these Templars want from you?

text: Halep'te seni öldürmeye çalıştıklarını daha bu sabah anlatmışken......gecesinde bütün melanetlerini obamıza yaymaya çalışırlar.
english: They told us about the people who tried to kill you in Aleppo......and they are trying to spread their curses to our tribe.

text: Her şey senin şu misafir aileyi onların elinden kurtarmanla başladı. Bu ne iştir?
english: You started everything by saving this guest family from them. What is this?
It is deeper than it seems, father.

text: Zannetmem ki konu sadece Halimelerle alakalı olsun.
english: I don't think it's just about Halime.

text: Tapınakçıların esas saldırma sebebi, haçlıların dibinde yurt tutmamızdan olsa gerek.
english: The main reason for the Templars' attack......must be because we have a home in the Crusaders' side.
You cannot fool them.

text: Ama misafirlerimizin bizden gizlediği bir sır var.
english: But our guests have a secret that they are hiding from us.
And this secret...
A dangerous secret.
Of course, they are our guests.
He is the crown of our head..
But nothing can be more important than this, Ertugrul.
Ertugrul.
Son.
The daughter of the tribe is not the daughter of the wild.
Don't think about it.
Em...

text: Seni tez vakitte Gökçe kızımızla baş göz etmek isteriz.
english: We want to see you with our daughter Gokce as soon as possible.

text: Haymanan'la konuştuk, ben de münasip gördüm.
english: We talked to mother Hayme, I thought she was right.
It's okay.
The evil of day is better than the good of night.
Come to your senses.
Then we will talk.
Come on.
Come on.
What is it that makes you so restless, son?
What does my father say?
Gokce will be my lover.
Gokce is the daughter of the Bey.
...in our house.
Sleep, sleep.
We know your race.
You know that, mother.
Do you know my heart?
Halime...
There is no tomorrow.
We do not know who they are.
They call us merchants.
...your father would not say anything. But he knows...
They are not merchants either.
They are the guests of God Almighty.
Where does the end go?
He does not allow it.
The promise of the father.
If the safety of your tribe is important to you...

text: Gökçe der, başka bir şey demez.
english: Gokce, she won't say anything else.
...Hakcalip's Ceylan brought him here.
How can I do that?
To those sweet tongues.

text: Bir gün cesaret eder de sorarsam.
english: If I ask you, you will be brave one day.
...to see if you have a heart.

text: O da yolum senin yolundur derse...
english: If he says that you are on my path...
How can I go to her, mother?
Do you hear?
So that my eyes can close for a moment.
He wouldn't give anything.
I talked to the doctor.
My daughter's father is better.
They leave without moving.
I called you Gokce.
But I am not feeling well.
Ertugrul's other daughter has a heart.

text: Alp'in gönlü obasıyla izinine gider hay be.
english: Alps' soul goes to the tribe's shrine.
He's young.
He is a young man.
It makes your heart beat faster.
...and moved to the tribe and built a tent...
...and the one in your heart.
Thank you.
He told me that he would marry you to Ertugrul.
How should I know, sister?
I feel like butterflies flying in my veins.

text: Öte yandan da bir kara bulut tüketmiyor sanki.
english: It is as if a black cloud is not going anywhere.
Take a look.

text: Bütün kötülükleri üzerinden tamamdır bu iş. Gündoğdu dönsün hele, gayrı dönüş yok artık.
english: ...and all the bad things in the world. As long as Gundogdu is alive, there is no turning back.
Didn't Ertugrul come?
He is not here, my Bey. He is in his tent. Please.
My dear Gökçe.

text: Git haber ediver. Sabah aşına gelsin.
english: Go and tell him. Let him come to his senses.
Come Gökçe.

text: Süleyman Şah'ım seni sabah açısına bekler Ertuğrul Bey.
english: Suleyman Shah is waiting for you in the morning, Ertugrul Bey.
Yes, sister.
The meeting is over.
We will give the land as many soldiers as we want.
We will pay the taxes.
We accept the land you have shown.

text: Yarın sabah tez vakitte yola çık. Selamlarımı ilet.
english: Tomorrow morning, come on the road as soon as possible. Send my regards.

text: Yeni yurdumuza yerleştiğimizde kendisini ziyaret edeceğini bildiriver.
english: When we settle in our new homeland, inform me that you will visit him.
Thank you.
When we settle in our new home...
We will have a wedding with Gokce.
I want a grandchild, Ertugrul.
Thank you.

text: Kimdir o gelen? Hamza geldi beyim. Size görüşmek ister. Gelsin hemen.
english: Who is that? He came to the tent, sir. He wants to see you. Let him in.

text: Kara Toygar mı? Ne diyorsun sen be adam? Gündoğdu nerede? Diğer alplerim nerede?
english: Karatoygar? What are you talking about? Where is Gundogdu? Where are my other Alps?
He's dead.
That's why I'm a blacksmith, Esra.
How could you leave me?

text: Seni nasıl bıraktılar? Ne istermiş bu Kara Toygar denilen yılan?
english: How did they leave you? What does this snake called Kara Toygar want?
The guests I brought for Ertugrul Bey, sir.
Kara Toygar wants them.
...if you don't give it tomorrow.
They will kill Gundogdu Bey.

text: Sen sebep oldun bunlara. Hepsi senin yüzünden. O Allah'ın belalarını getirdin buraya. Başımıza gelmeyen hiç kalmadı. Selcan!
english: You caused all this. It's all because of you. You brought all the troubles of God here. We are in trouble now. Selcan!

text: Güvendiğin adamları gönder, cenazelerimizi alıp getirsinler. Hamza'yı da kimseye göstermeden bir çadıra götür.
english: Send the men you trust to take our bodies. Take Hamza to a tent without showing anyone.

text: Akçakoca ilgilensin. Olanı biteni obada kimsenin bilmesini istemiyorum.
english: Let Akcakoca take care of it. I don't want anyone to know what happened in the tribe.

text: Bana da Numan'ı getir! Ön edersin beyim.
english: Bring me Numan, too. As you command, my Bey.

text: Ne destur üstadamsın be? Böyle girilir mi elin çadırına? Halime.
english: What kind of a man are you? How could you enter my tent like this? Halime.
Suleyman Shah is waiting for you in his tent.
Hurry up.
Be quick!
Numan Efendi.
No.

text: Merak etme Afşin, bir şey yok.
english: Don't worry, Afsin. It's okay.
Halime, where are they taking my Shahzada?
Suleyman Shah wanted to see you.

text: ...böyle olacağını biliyordum ben. Başımıza bunların geleceğini biliyordum.
english: I knew it would be like this. I knew this would happen to us.

text: Eğer Gündoğdu'nun kılına zarar gelirse o kızın da ailesinin de canını alırım!
english: If Gundogdu's head gets hurt, I will kill that girl and her family.
Stop, my dear. Stop!

text: Bey hatununa metanetli olmak yakışır. Topa kendini.
english: ...to be a mother of a Bey. Get yourself together...
Yes, sir.
Do not call me.
Let's go this way.
A informant came this morning.
...and give me a caravan...
He informed me that the Alps were killed.
Kara Toygar who did this...
My son was captured by Gundogdu.
What is it called? I do not know.
Have patience.
Pray for me.
I didn't call you to report your impressions.
I am sorry for calling you here.

text: Oğlum rehin tutan eşkıyaların benden ne istediklerini anlamışsındır.
english: You know what the bandits who took my son's heart want from me.

text: Şimdi sana tek bir soru soracağım.
english: I will ask you one question.

text: Ve karşılığında senden tek bir cevap istiyorum.
english: And I want only one answer from you.
Who are you?

text: Bir yanda kocam bir yanda bu ne ediyor bilirsizlerin canı.
english: On the one hand, my husband and on the other hand, the lives of those who don't know what this is.

text: Onca Alp'i öldürdüler. Gündoğdu'yu esir aldılar.
english: They killed so many Alps. They took Gundogdu prisoner.

text: Lakin sana söylüyorum bunların bizden sakladığı bir şey var. Ama ben onu öğreneceğim sonra da bunun hesabını soracağım. Yeri dağlar töreyi beyler tutar kızım.
english: But I'm telling you, there is something that they are hiding from us. But I will find out and then I will ask for the account of this. The mountains hold the customs, my dear.
That is the job of the men you are talking about.

text: Bunların musibetleri yüzünden obada el mi kaldı bey ana?
english: Are they still alive because of their problems, mother?

text: Şunun peşinden. Daha çok ortalığı karıştırmasın.
english: Follow him. Don't get in the way.

text: Size bunu söylemek boylamamın borcudur. Fakat...
english: It is my duty to tell you this. But...
I'm sure of it.
...as much as my own security.
I'm as good as my family's security.
I am thinking about your safety.
My Bey.
If I tell you who we are...
The disasters you have experienced today...

text: Emin olun şimdikinden kat ve kat fazla olacaktır.
english: I am sure that he will be more and more determined than he is now.
I owe you a life.
I am ready for every sacrifice for you.
I don't want to...

text: Evlatırımın canı dahildir. Sana tek bir cevap dedim. Tek bir cevap!
english: ...is my son's life. I said one answer! One answer!
...from the great Seljuk dynasty...
...Muzafferuddin Davut.
Muhyiddin, son of Mesut Shah.
Sultan Ezettin...
...the grandson of the sword lion.
I'm the Prince of Seljuk.

text: Eşit beni! Buraya geldiğin güne lanet edeceksin!
english: You will curse me the day you come here.

text: Sen ki her ne yaşattın bu obaya misli misli ödeyeceksin. Anladın mı şimdi beni? Eğer iş bana düşerse gözümü kırpmadan eceliniz olurum sizin. Eceliniz!
english: You will pay for everything you have done for this tribe. Do you understand? If I am in trouble, I will kill you before I can even blink.
Slow down, Hatun.
You attack like a wild horse.

text: Sizin yüzünüzden kervanımız basıldı. Yiğitlerimiz öldürüldü. Kara Toygar denen namussuz kocamı esir aldı. Hele onun kılına bir zarar gelsin. Hele benim canım bir yansın. Sen kudurmak neymiş o zaman göreceksin. Abla!
english: Our caravan was raided because of you. Our valiant men were killed. My dishonest husband, Kara Toygar, was captured. Let him be hurt, let my life burn......then you will see what it is to be a widow! Sister!
Let's go.

text: Biz gitmeyeceğiz Gökçe onlar gidecek. Ölü ya da diri.
english: We will not go, Gokce. They will go. Dead or alive.
Selcan!
Get out of here.
From my daughter-in-law.
I'm not going anywhere.
Don't tell anyone about this.
I'll be back.
Because I do not know what will happen...
None of us know.
Do you have permission to do so, Halime?
I heard them all.
This is not good at all.
What are we going to do, Afsin Bey?

text: Gelini gelip kocasına bir şey olursa bizi öldürmekle tehdit etti.
english: If something happens to her husband, he threatened to kill us.
We'll find a solution, of course.
Obviously, Suleyman Shah...
The funeral will hide me.
If we hear anything...

text: Ahalinin ne yapacağı hiç belli olmaz. Allah korusun.
english: It's not clear what the people will do. God forbid.

text: Ne şehzadelerimize bir şey olsun ne de Gündoğdu'ya.
english: ...neither to our Shahzadas nor to Gundogdu.
Kara Toygar's intention is clear.
...in return for...
He will ask for our Shahzadas.

text: Siz çadırdan çıkmayın. Ben ne gerekiyorsa yapacağım.
english: You don't leave the tent. I'll do whatever I need.
Excuse me.
They have been running for hours. We are tired, my Bey.

text: Benim varlığıma devletimi tehdit edenlerden kaçtım.
english: I escaped from those who threatened my state and my existence.
From the Templars.
I ran away from the Mongols and their curiosity to make you happy.
I will be the one to take revenge for those who follow me
My little son.

text: Yiğidime zarar gelmesin diye de devletimden kaçtım.
english: I ran away from my state so that my Yigit wouldn't be harmed.

text: Ben kendi canımdan vazgeçeli çok oldum.
english: I gave up on my own life.

text: Buraya kadarmış. Artık bu işe bir son vermenin zamanı geldi.
english: This is it. It is time to end this business.
Kara Toygar wants a bet, father.
But even if we give him what he wants...
...will kill you anyway.

text: Şehzadeler alınca sana olan öfkesi bitmeyecek.
english: When the Shahzadas take it, you will be furious.
...and kill you and my brother.
You are right son.
First,

text: ...Gündoğdu'yu onun elinden kurtarmanın bir yolunu bulmalıyız.
english: We must find a way to save Gundogdu from him.
Not just my brother.

text: Seni de ona teslim etmem baba.
english: I won't hand you over to him either, father.
...if I were to go against my opponents...
...won't let Gundogdu live.

text: Dökülecek kanla oba bir daha iflah etmez.
english: The tribe will never prosper again with the blood to be spilled.
We will be destroyed.

text: İlk önce ağabeyimi serbest bırakmaya onu ikna etmek için baba.
english: First, you have to convince him to let my brother go free, father.
Then, he left the headquarters.
Since he wants a bet...

text: Kuralları biz belirleyeceğiz. Gündoğdu'yu niye bıraksın ki? Bırakmak zorunda baba.
english: We will set the rules. Why should he leave Gundogdu? He has to, father.

text: Tapınakçılar beni Halep'te neden öldürmeye kalktı?
english: Why did the Templars kill me in Aleppo?

text: Neden obayı zehirlemek için cüzdanlı bir kadın yolladılar?
english: Why did they send a woman with a wallet to poison the tribe?

text: Neden tapınakçılar şehzadeleri Kara Toygar'a götürüyorlardı? Tapınakçılar Kara Toygar'ın sarayda önemli bir mevki elde etmesini istiyorlardı. Onlara hizmet etmesini. Kara Toygar'ın asıl istediği şehzadeler baba.
english: Why did the Templars take the Shahzadas to Kara Toygar? The Templars wanted Kara Toygar to have an important position in the palace. To serve them. The Shahzadas are what Kara Toygar wanted, father.
He does everything for them.
As long as we know how to ask for it.
If not, as you say.
Come on.
Then we all die, father.

text: Ama en azından elimizde kılıcımız, onurumuzla ölürüz.
english: But at least we have our swords and honor to kill.
Come on.
Are they all dead?
Unfortunately it has to be like that.
Everyone will die except Gundogdu.
Maybe someone lucky...
Bad news...
...to Suleyman Shah.
Come on.
Suleyman Shah's reign will end.
Go on, my dear husband.
Lie.
If he insists on being a coward...

text: Esirleri vermezse? Vermeyip de ne yapacak?
english: What if he doesn't give the prisoners? What will he do if he doesn't?
Will he say amen to the death of his son?

text: Alplerini toplayıp Kara Toygar'a saldırırsa ne yapacağız?
english: What will we do if he gathers his Alps and attacks Kara Toygar?
...you know Suleyman Shah well.
He will reveal his true self.

text: Kara Toygar ikisini de ortadan kaldıracak.
english: Farah Toygar will remove them both.
There is only Ertugrul left.
And...
I went too far, my Bey. Too far.

text: Bu işin sonu hiç iyi değil. Ulan it! Madem bu kadar korkuyordun......niye benimle birlik oldun?
english: This is not the end. You idiot! If you were so scared, why did you join me?

text: Obanın düze çıkması için beyim... Bu işin buraya varacağını... Neye varacak ha? Neye varacak?
english: I'm doing this to make the tribe stand up. What will you do? What will you do?

text: Bu obanın iyiliği için üç beş alp feda edilecekse edilir. Edilmez mi ha? Söyle bana edilmez mi?
english: If 3-5 Alps are sacrificed for the good of this tribe, they will be sacrificed. Won't they be sacrificed? Tell me, won't they be sacrificed?
...I swear to God.
It is.
I don't know.

text: Allah hepsini gani gani rahmet eylesin.
english: May God bless them all.
We did what was necessary.

text: Eğer Kara Toygar'ı kervan baskınına ikna etmeseydim...
english: If I didn't convince Kara Toygar to the caravan raid...

text: Ordusuyla üstümüzden geçerdi. Sülalemizi çürütürdü. Şimdi tek yapmamız gereken şey arkamıza yaslanıp...
english: He would have been on our side with his army. He would have ruined our tribe. Now, all we have to do is to get behind him...
Waiting for the news of the black news to fall on the tribe.

text: Sen de git elin yüzünü yıka. Kendine gel hadi.
english: Go wash your hands. Get yourself together.

text: Bu korkuğa dikkat et Alpargu. Eğer korkusu diline vuracak olursa......kökünden koparmaktan da çekinme.
english: Be careful with this fear, Alpargu. If your fear will be heard......do not hesitate to break it.
Come on.
Everything will be fine, you'll see.
Suleyman Shah would never sacrifice his son.
If he doesn't say goodbye...
Of course not.
But he never breaks his tradition.
Dad.

text: Allah aşkına olmayacak şeyler düşünüp kendini perişan etme.
english: For God's sake, don't think about things that won't happen and get upset.

text: ...Gündoğdu'yu Kara Toygar'ın elinden kurtarmak için bir delilik yaparsan......içimi kemiren bu Gökçe...
english: If you do something to save Gundogdu and Kara Toygar......this Gokce who is making me mad...
I will go and talk to Suleyman Shah.
First, he will release Gundogdu.

text: Sonra Kara Toygar'ı istediğimiz yere getirmek için yola çıkaracağım.
english: Then I will set off to bring Kara Tolgar to the place we want.
When we get to the place we're going to...

text: Gerisi artık sizin cesaret ve hünerinize kalacak evlat.
english: The rest will depend on your courage and courage, son.

text: Büyüğün bir mesele konuşulmakta Selcan Hatun. Çekil önümden. Beyimizin emri...
english: There is a big matter to be discussed, Selcan Hatun. Get out of my way. Our Bey's order...
I told you to get out of my sight!
We will set Toygar in the trap at Kartal Hill.

text: ...Gündoğdu ağabeyimi sana sağ salim getireceğime dair söz veriyorum. Eğer Gündoğdu'ma bir şey olursa......eğer ağabeyini yolda bulduklarına feda edersen......iki elim yakanda olur Ertuğrul.
english: I promise to bring my brother Gundogdu back to you safe and sound. If something happens to my Gundogdu......if you sacrifice your brother for what he found on the road......I will be in your hands, Ertugrul.
As a father.
...I have one last request.
If you allow me.
I want to tell you about my daughter.
Kara Toygar.
My son and I are after him.
My daughter is fine.
She is my daughter now.
Who is he?
Take it.
God bless you, sister.
What do you want?
I was going to ask the head of a tent.
He was the head of the tribe.
Who are you looking for?
They call it a yellow beaver.
We know the yellow bear of course.

text: Ama artık kendisi otak başı değil, bölük başı oldu.
english: But now he is not a tentative, he is a division head.
I'm in the station.

text: Kara Toygar'la göreve gitti. Bir diyeceğin varsa bize de. Var. Var yiğidim var.
english: He went to work with Kara Toygar. If you have anything to say to us. I have. I have, Yigit. I have.
What are you doing?
Sit down.
I read the letter that the Sultan sent with the pigeon.
He didn't want the Kayis to migrate to Aleppo.
Yes.
Don't you worry.
The Kayis went to the north,
They will migrate to the place I want.
Nasser.
The future Beys will think the same way I do.
rather than walking on the feet of the Crusaders,
...the Mongols would sit on the bottom of the line.
Who is this man?
Turbo.
Suleyman Shah's blood brother.
I'm sorry.
You idiot.
...will not be out of our hands.
Someone we can use as we want.
Yasuleyman Shah.
Suleyman Shah.
When evening comes...
...to my headquarters...
...will surrender.
Moreover...

text: Şövalyelerinin elinden kaçırdığı şehzadeleri de yanında getirecek.
english: He will bring the princes that his knights have lost.
I was thinking.
It should have been known that way.
Our state is under great threat.
I need your help.
Where is this bad news?
Suleyman Shah is waiting for you in his tent.

text: Her ne olursa olsun şehzadeleri Kara Toygar almamalı.
english: Whatever happens, we shouldn't take the Shahzadas from Kara Toygar.

text: Ya Sultan Alaaddin'e şehzadeleri götürmeyi başarırsa?
english: If Sultan Alahaddin manages to take the Shahzadas...
Aladdin's
He will be the most eye-catching commander.
The Templars keep Konya as a safe haven.

text: Devletin içinde cirit atarlar. Bunun vebali büyük olur Sarı.
english: They throw a fit in the state. This will cause a lot of trouble.
We didn't build this state easily.
If necessary
We won't hesitate to kill the Shahzadas.

text: Benden ne istiyorsanız yapmaya hazırım Bey'im.
english: I'm ready to do whatever you want, sir.
Okay, I know.
You cruel Kara Toygar!
How could he kill our warriors?

text: Üstüne üstlük, Gündoğdu'yu da esir etmiş ha.
english: And he imprisoned Gundogdu.
Yes.

text: Şimdi misafirleri teslim etme mi bekliyorlar?
english: Now they are waiting for the guests to be delivered.

text: Öyleyse bu kuduz itin eceli bizim elimizden olacak.
english: Then we will kill this kuduz dog.
Let's go with our Alps and take the world by its hands. Yes.
I will go alone.
I won't leave you alone.

text: Birimiz ölüme giderken öteki ardından baksın, avratlar gibi gözyaşı döksün diye mi? Kan kardeş olduk zamanında beyim.
english: We became blood brothers when someone was going to die......and someone else was going to die and someone else was going to die......so that he could shed tears like women, my Bey.

text: Benim çıkacağım yolun akıbeti meçhul Kurdoğlu.
english: The end of my journey is unknown, Kurdoglu.
When something happens to me...

text: Ardında bıraktığım obama......kan kardeşimin kol kanat gerdiğini bilmezsem......gözüm açık gitmez mi?
english: If I don't know that my blood brother is a traitor......wouldn't I be able to see clearly?
...when you are in the army.
Here.
The roads are not easy.
Sister. Yes, my lion?
What if I can't see you again?
Why did you say that?
We have been through so much.
What difficulties have we faced?
We'll get over this, of course.

text: Ama bu defa ayrılıyoruz ve yanımızda sen yoksun. Ya adamlar bizi alır? Sen hiç yüreğini böyle dertlerle sıkma olur mu aslan kardeşim?
english: But this time we are leaving and you are not with us. What if those men take us? Don't ever worry about such things, my brother.

text: Bak bu defa yalnız değiliz. Obanın beyleri var. Onlar bizim canımızı korurlar, bize sahip çıkarlar.
english: Look, this time we are not alone. The Beys of the tribe are here. They protect us, they take care of us.

text: Sen babamın yanından ayrılma. Onun sözünden çıkma yeter olur mu?
english: Don't leave my father. You should keep your word.
Don't think about me.
I will sit here and wait for you.
Don't be upset.
subscribe
Come on. Now go.
...to your friends.
Don't be afraid.
I'm telling you so that you don't get upset.
I can't believe it, dad.
What will happen?
It's been a long time.
...and run away.
We were trapped and suffered a lot.
This time it will be over in the end.
Ertugrul has an idea.
I also have it in my mind.

text: Tez zamanda sağ salim gidip geri döneceğiz Allah'ın izniyle.
english: We will be back soon, with the permission of God.

text: Baba bizim için o kadar ağır bedeller ödedi ki.
english: Father paid such a heavy price for our business...

text: Ne yapsak hasta haklarını ödeyemeyiz baba.
english: We cannot pay for what we did, father.
But father, please let me.

text: İzin ver ben de sizinle geleyim.
english: If you excuse me, I will come with you.

text: Ne olacaksa olsun hayır yada şer.
english: Whatever happens, be it good or bad...
May we have a happy ending.

text: Bizim için dua et yeter kızım.
english: Pray for us, that's enough.
Thank you.
How beautiful.
My brave daughter.
Like mother...
...for free.
He is a murderer.
My beautiful daughter.
Don't worry.
...is dead.
...will be destroyed.
Where are they? What do you want? They are in front of us.

text: Saplanmış bıçak gibi canımı yakar mı çıban bu subet? Ah be ah!
english: I would be dead if I were you. Oh, my Bey.

text: Acın acımdır. Bilal ki elimden bir şey gelmez.
english: I am sorry. I hope I do not hurt you.

text: Evlatlarım ve senin için dua etmekten başka bir şey yapamıyorum. Biz ne acılar çektik.
english: I cannot do anything but pray for my children and you. We suffered a lot.
We have neither seen any refugees nor wars.
My husband is lucky too.

text: Şükürler ola ki bugünlere kadar gelebildik Hayme'm. Gördük ya beyim.
english: Thank God we were able to come here today, Hayme. We see, my Bey.

text: Ne düğünler, ne yeni bebeler, ne baharlar...
english: No weddings, no new babies, no spring...
We saw victories.
We will see about that, God willing.
Give me your blessing.
What will be of these troubles?
What a life, my Bey.
You should walk on the right path.
You didn't bend or bend.
...the one who was walking on the right path has disappeared.

text: Allah nasip ederse senin ve evlatlarının dönmesini göreceğim.
english: If God permits, I will see you and your children back.
May God help you.
May God bless you.
Thank you.
What do you want?

text: Nereden gelir nereye gidersin Afşin Bey?
english: Where are you from and where are you going Afsin Bey?

text: İn misin cin misin bir senden duymak istedim.
english: I wanted to hear if you were a man or a woman.
You got me, mom.
I did.
Go on.
Yes.
Do I have permission to come in?
Halime Sultan.

text: Otağımıza gelir de müsaadenin lafı mı olur?
english: Would you excuse me if I came to our tent?
I lied to you.
Yes, you did.

text: Şimdi anladın mı neden gitmek zorunda olduğumuzu?
english: Now do you understand why we have to go?

text: Neden bu obada geçen günlerin bizim için tez vakitte sona erecek bir rüya olduğunu? Sen burada mutlusun.
english: Why did father say that the past days were a dream for us......and that it would end soon? You are happy here.
Despite his life in the palace...

text: Göçebe bir obada rüyadayım diyorsun ya Halime.
english: You said you were dreaming of a nomadic tribe, Halime.
If the whole world comes together...
...I will not let you be unhappy again.
Tell me, dear.
I understood.
I was surprised.

text: Kötü söz söylemek yerine Allah'ın adını al.
english: Instead of saying bad things, take the name of God.
...to the right.
...and fill your heart with goodness...
God bless you.
...is not only my happiness.
This is my father's brother's life.

text: Hiç ne de bir şey olmasına müsaade etmeyeceğim.
english: I won't let anything happen to you.
I will bring them to you safely.
God bless you.
...from the things that I've been told.

text: Koparıp alınanlardan geriye kalan ne varsa.
english: ...and what is left behind.
You will take them, Ertugrul.
Dad.
My sister.

text: Al varım sen de onlarla dön.
english: I beg you, you should go back with them.
Go back and complete the school inside me.
If you cannot return, know that...

text: Şimdi eksik olan ne varsa sen de buldun.
english: Now you have found what is missing.

text: Onların niyeti başka Gökçe. Töre için erimi ölüme yollayacaklar.
english: They have a different intention, Gokce. They will send my husband to die for Töri.

text: Abla, bak Süleyman Şah da bir insan.
english: Sister, Suleyman Shah is a man.

text: İnsan hiç evladına kıyar mı? Ne olur çıkar şu vesveseleri aklından. Sen Süleyman Şah'ı tanımamışsın daha. O töresi için obasını bile yakar. Mutlaka bir yol bulmalıyım Gökçe, mutlaka!
english: Can't you even think about your own son? Get rid of those nonsense. You don't even know Suleyman Shah. He even burns his tribe for his tradition. I must find a way, Gokce. I must!
I will not let them sacrifice my husband!
I'm sorry.

text: Ertuğrul'un alpleri atlanmış, pusatlanmış gitmeyi bekler.
english: The Alps of Ertugrul are waiting to go.
I have something to tell you, Kurdoglu.
What is it, Selcan Hatun?

text: Gündoğdu sana güvenir. Seni sayar bilirsin.
english: Gundogdu trusts you. He knows you.
What about you, Selcan Hatun?
I always trusted your bravery.
...that Gundogdu's death is not a big deal.
But do not worry.

text: Süleyman Şah onu getirecektir. Hayır bunu yapmayacak.
english: Suleyman Shah will bring him. No, he won't do that.
If you are brave...

text: Eğer Süleyman Şah'ın obasını ateşe atmasını istemiyorsan...
english: If you don't want Suleyman Shah to set his tribe on fire...

text: Eğer Gündoğdu'yu biraz olsun seviyorsa... Eğer Süleyman Şah böyle bir şey yaparsa......onu ateşe ben kendi ellerimle atarım.
english: If you love Gundogdu a little... If Suleyman Shah does something like this......I will throw him into the fire with my own hands.
Now I am listening to you, Selcan Hatun.
Suleyman Shah.
...with Ertugrul...

text: Kara Toygar'ı Kartal Tepesi'nde tuzağa düşürecek.
english: ...will set Karatoygar in a trap on Kartal Hill.

text: Ne diyorsun sen Selcan Hatun? Kulaklarımla duydum.
english: What are you saying, Selcan Hatun? I heard it with my own ears.

text: Süleyman Şah töresini ezip geçmektense oğlunu ezip geçmeyi tercih etti diyorum sana.
english: I'm telling you that Suleyman Shah chose to crush your son rather than crushing his tradition.
Don't tell anyone about this, Selcan Hatun.

text: Benimle de hiç konuşmadın, hiç görüşmedik. Tamam mı Selcan Hatun?
english: And you never spoke to me. Never. Okay, Selcan Hatun?
What will happen to Gundogdu?
We will find a way out, of course.
Come on, go before anyone sees you.

text: ...kullanacaklar. Karatoygar'ın avı daha bereketli olsun diye izin vereceğiz Alpargu. Elim kılıcıma gitmeden, üstüme kan bulaşmadan obayı bütün pisliklerden temizledim.
english: Will we let them go, my Bey? We will let them go so that Kara Toygar's hunt is more fruitful, Alpargu. I cleaned the tribe of all filth before I lost my hand and blood.
Get on your horse.
I have something to say to Kara Toygar.

text: Soluk soluğa koşan atlara ant olsun.
english: Long live the horses running left and right.

text: Nallarından kızılcım çıkanlara and olsun. Boyumuz için.
english: May the ones who are born from their nests be blessed with a moment. For our height.
For our Bey.
If I am afraid of dying for our tradition...

text: Kara çelik, öz kılıncımla gök ekin gibi biçileyin.
english: I will cut you into pieces with my own sword.
May the blue sky split.
May the summer place go crazy!
My name should be erased from the bangle.
Oghuz, my father.
May my blessed tribe be a claimant from me in the hereafter.

text: Çıktığım gaza yolunda Allah yardımcım, Hızır Ata yoldaşım olsun!
english: May God help me and be my companion on the road of disaster.
Come on Titus, relax.
The day is ours.
We'll get what we want.

text: Ertuğrul Halep'e giderken de böyle rahattın.
english: You were so relaxed when Ertugrul was going to Aleppo.
You were so loose.
Then, you know.
The incompetence of their men.
Sir, Suleyman Shah.
Let's not make our guests wait. Let them come.
They came alone sir.
Bring him here.

text: Bakalım umduğunu mu yoksa bulduğunu mu yiyeceksin Kara Toygar?
english: Let's see if you're right or wrong, Kara Toygar.
Uuugggh!
What are you doing, Suleyman Shah?
Where are they?
You will take what you want when you leave my son.
Are you silent for your own sake?

text: Oğlumla benim canım mı daha kıymetli?
english: Is my son and my life more precious...
Otherwise, I would have killed the Shahzadas.
